channel.title: embedded on John Ingle - Software Development
channel.description: Recent content in embedded on John Ingle - Software Development

item.title: Simple Derivatives in Python
item.description: A rocket has been programmed to follow the path $y = x^2$ in space (from left to right along the curve, as seen in the margin figure), but an emergency has arisen and the crew must return to their base, which is located at coordinates (3, 5). At what point on the path $y = x^2$ should the captain turn off the engines so that the ship will coast along a path tangent to the curve to return to the base?

item.title: Jupyter Notebooks in WordPress
item.description: The quickest way to embed your Jupyter notebooks in WordPress, or any web page, is to create a gist. Ensure you have a GitHub account Go to: https://gist.github.com/ Give your gist a file name and include the .ipynb file extension (important) Using a text editor, copy the contents of your [filename].ipynb into the gist. Create the gist as a public gist. Share!

item.title: Testing the Embedding of Raw Html in Jupyter Notebooks
item.description: /** * Primary styles * * Author: Jupyter Development Team */ /** WARNING IF YOU ARE EDITTING THIS FILE, if this is a .css file, It has a lot * of chance of beeing generated from the ../less/[samename].less file, you can * try to get back the less file by reverting somme commit in history **/ /* * We’ll try to get something pretty, so we * have some strange css to have the scroll bar on
